review: Work great. Would get the five TV next time for the faster processor
author: JRV

review: The Amazin Fire worked easily right out of the box. It linked up with my Wi-Fi in seconds. The instructions were clear and easy to understand. I have used it on trips where hotel rooms have Wi-Fi. It lets me bring my Amazon instant videos as well as Netflix along for the ride. I have recommended it to several of my friends and they love it too.
author: John C Huggins

review: Fast shipping, easy to set up and use.
author: Megan

review: This is great quick easy set up clear crisp pic and sound would  recommend  to any prime Amazon member
author: jerry mc

review: Love it. Bought one for a gift
author: Linda Lind

review: Great for a gift idea. Love this item and will purchase more in the future.
